request.description:
In order to get access to user's account this API is needed which needs 2 parameters email and password.
**Header**
| Key | Value | |:-------------:|:------------------:| | NST | [JWT Token] | | DeviceId | [User's Device Id] | | Content-Type | [application/json] | **Body**
```json { email : String, password: String, } ```

request.description:
This API is for fetching category lists in homepage.
**Header**
| Key | Value | |:-------------:|:------------------:| | NST | [JWT Token] | | Token | [auth token] | | DeviceId | [User's Device Id] |
**Response**
```json { Data: [ { DefaultPictureModel: { ImageUrl: String, FullSizeImageUrl: String, Title: String, AlternateText: String, CustomProperties: {Any Object} }, Id: Number, Name: String, ProductCount: Number } ] } ```

request.description:
This API is called for fetching a Category with Products, PriceRange, NotFilteredItems, AlreadyFilteredItems, FilterItems, AvailableSortOptions, TotalPages. User will be able to see products according to their selected price or specifications. They can also filter or sort items or tag items. For example: ###### Filter by PriceRange If anyone wants to filter products by price then “price” will be added as a query parameter after “https://apps.nop-station.com/api/Category/{categoryId}?pagenumber=1”. For Example: https://apps.nop-station.com/api/Category/1?pagenumber=1&price=54.000000-1203.000000 ###### Filter by Specifications If anyone wants to filter products by specifications then “specs” & “price” will be added as a query parameter after “https://apps.nop-station.com/api/Category/{categoryId}?pagenumber=1”. The value of “specs” will be “FilterId” from “NotFilteredItems” of JSON response. For Example: https://apps.nop-station.com/api/Category/35?pagenumber=1&price=54.990000-1800.000000&specs=6 ###### Sort Products If anyone wants to sort products then “orderby” & “price” will be added as a query parameter after “https://apps.nop-station.com/api/Category/{categoryId}?pagenumber=1”. The value of “orderby” will be “Value” from “AvailableSortOptions”. For Example: https://apps.nop-station.com/api/Category/1?orderby=10&pagenumber=1&price=54.990000-1800.000000 ###### both sort & filter products If anyone wants to both sort & filter products then “orderby” & “price” & “specs” will be added as a query parameter after “https://apps.nop-station.com/api/Category/{categoryId}?pagenumber=1” For Example: https://apps.nop-station.com/api/Category/1?orderby=10&pagenumber=1&price=1350.000000-1800.000000&specs=8 ###### Products by Tag http://apps.nop-station.com/api/Category/7?pagenumber=1&tags=8,11
